net.alantea.horizon.message.internal

Class RegisterManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.alantea.horizon.message.internal.RegisterManager

  • public class RegisterManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class RegisterManager. It deals with objects registering to events (all identifiers) in contexts, or for all the application.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RegisterManager() 

    • Method Summary

      Register to all messages that we are waiting for in the context.
      static void registerAllMessages(java.lang.Object object)
      Register to all messages in all contexts.
      static void unregister(java.lang.Object object)
      Unregister to default context.
      static void unregister(java.lang.Object context, java.lang.Object listener)
      Unregister in given context.
      static void unregisterAllMessages(java.lang.Object object)
      Unregister the object from getting all future messages if it was registered for this.

    • Method Detail

      • register

        public static final void register(java.lang.Object object)
        Register to all messages that we are waiting for in default context. This method search for all @Listen(message="ID") or @Listen(messages={"ID1", "ID2"...}) annotations. It also look to all "onXXXXMessage" methods using XXXX as ID. Then it subscribes the object to all corresponding IDs messages.
        Parameters:
        object - the object

      • register

        public static final void register(java.lang.Object context,
                                  java.lang.Object object)
        Register to all messages that we are waiting for in the context. This method search for all @Listen(message="ID") or @Listen(messages={"ID1", "ID2"...}) annotations. It also look to all "onXXXXMessage" methods using XXXX as ID. Then it subscribes the object to all corresponding IDs messages.
        Parameters:
        context - the context
        object - the object

      • registerAllMessages

        public static final void registerAllMessages(java.lang.Object object)
        Register to all messages in all contexts. This method search for all @Listen(message="ID") or @Listen(messages={"ID1", "ID2"...}) annotations. It also look to all "onXXXXMessage" methods using XXXX as ID. Then it subscribes the object to all corresponding IDs messages. It is using "onMessage" method for all other messages.
        Parameters:
        object - the object

      • unregister

        public static final void unregister(java.lang.Object object)
        Unregister to default context.
        Parameters:
        object - the object to unregister

      • unregister

        public static final void unregister(java.lang.Object context,
                                    java.lang.Object listener)
        Unregister in given context.
        Parameters:
        context - the context
        listener - the listener

      • unregisterAllMessages

        public static final void unregisterAllMessages(java.lang.Object object)
        Unregister the object from getting all future messages if it was registered for this.
        Parameters:
        object - the object
